name: .IMT File Extension
summary: Learn about .IMT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file created by Intuit My Time, a time tracking application for Mac OS X; saves timesheet information in an XML format; can be imported into QuickBooks 2010 for Mac.

content: Data saved in IMT files can also be exported by My Time into a standard text format that can be imported and edited by spreadsheet applications.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
